activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11717
activity.text:
> > @Jacobjeevan
> > > You would also need to adjust the cancel button in LocationActionButtons so it shows us for all scenarios (not just planned).
> > > cc: @amjithtitus09
> > 
> > 
> > I wanted to ask some clarifying questions, right now in modified component, we only have two scenarios (active / planned ). since we can not delete the active location, so there is only one case remains (planned) !
> 
> Why can't we delete active location? ðŸ¤” What if user accidentally marks a bed as active and wants to delete it? Let's allow it unless backend rejects it.


@Jacobjeevan , Okay, I will implement this feature for active session too, I studied LocationSheet.tsx file thoroughly and found that many functions are desgined to handle `cancel-plan` for planned session only . I need to do many modifications to acoomplish this.
right now the bed location of  Encounter section is crashing that's why i am unable to work on this issue.
I will make necessary changes in the PR after the issue will be fixed.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11717
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan 

> You would also need to adjust the cancel button in LocationActionButtons so it shows us for all scenarios (not just planned).
> 
> cc: @amjithtitus09

I wanted to ask some clarifying questions, right now in modified component, we only have two scenarios (active / planned ). since we can not delete the active location, so there is only one case remains (planned) !
